document.docAuthor: van Nieukerken, Erik, Laštůvka, Aleš & Laštůvka, Zdeněk
document.masterDocTitle: Western Palaearctic Ectoedemia (Zimmermannia) Hering and Ectoedemia Busck s. str. (Lepidoptera: Nepticulidae): five new species and new data on distribution, hostplants and recognition

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Western Palaearctic Ectoedemia (Zimmermannia) Hering and Ectoedemia Busck s. str. (Lepidoptera: Nepticulidae): five new species and new data on distribution, hostplants and recognition

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Mendel University of Agriculture & Forestry, Brno ,, Czech Republic
Mendel University of Agriculture & Forestry, Brno ,, Czech Republic

subSubSection.paragraph:
Biology .
Hostplants: reared from
Quercus robur
L. Adults have been collected in forests with other species of
Quercus
as well. Larvae with a one or two year life cycle. Adults fly from 6 June to 30 August, not as late as
atrifrontella
.

Distribution .
Norway : Van Nieukerken and Johansson 1990 ; Finland : Mutanen et al. 2001 ; Latvia : Savenkov et al. 1996 ; Portugal : Van
Nieukerken et al. 2004 a
, Laštůvka and Laštůvka 2008; Czech Republic : Laštůvka and Laštůvka 1991 ; Slovakia : Laštůvka and Laštůvka 1991 ; Greece : Laštůvka and Laštůvka 1998 ; Russia : Van Nieukerken et al. 2004b ; Puplesis 1994 . See also Baldizzone 2004 ; Van Nieukerken et al. 2006 . Here recorded new for Bulgaria , Macedonia , San Marino and Switzerland and first detailed record for Georgia .
